testCase.name: Minesweeper game should... start with... a displayed output
Minesweeper game should... start with... which is an empty table
Minesweeper game should... start with... and has a start message
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) movements, so ... steps can be made by the user(bot)
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) movements, so ... bombs should be set by a bot, 3rd party logic
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) movements, so ... changes caused by steps should work
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) movements, so ... game over message should be shown
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) bomb discovery, so ... number of bombs are shown when the user(bot) click on a field with numbers
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) bomb discovery, so ... number of bombs are shown when the user(bot) click on a field with numbers
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) bomb discovery, so ... warning should be displayed in status field about number of bombs
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) bomb avoiding strategy, so ... bomb marking should be made available to user
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) bomb avoiding strategy, so ... bomb markings should be made by usershould be shown
Minesweeper game should... support user(bot) bomb avoiding strategy, so ... bomb warning should be made displayed after marking was done
Minesweeper game should... support user's(bot) victory, so that ... by clearing not discovered, non marked fields
Minesweeper game should... support user's(bot) victory, so that ... all numbers could be cleared next to non marked fields
Minesweeper game should... support user's(bot) victory, so that ... after all numbers were cleared properly a congratulations should be shown
